outputs.name: buildings
outputs.description: All of the Building objects contained within the input Model.

outputs.name: context
outputs.description: All of the ContextShade objects within the input Model.

inputs.name: _model
inputs.description:
A Dragonfly Model to be deconstructed into into its constituent
objects (Buildings, ContextShades).

code:
try:  # import the ladybug_{{cad}} dependencies
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))


if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    buildings = _model.buildings
    context = _model.context_shades
name: DF Deconstruct Model
description:
Deconstruct a Dragonfly Model object into all of its constituent Dragonfly objects.
-
